title: Adultery, Liberty and Sex as Portal to Meaning
description:
The seventh commandment seems to be one of those that people today find common-sensical. Don't cheat on your partners. The history of the commandment, however, is more complex, as is the way liberty has interacted with sex. Why does sex have an enduring sacramental quality and how should that impact our approach to it? 

NT Wright and Tom Holland Unbelievable https://youtu.be/nlf_ULB26cU
Conversation with Vaush https://youtu.be/LAUgExXyez4

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/
